org.apache.beam.sdk

Class PipelineRunner<ResultT extends PipelineResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.PipelineRunner<ResultT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ResultT - the type of the result of run(org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline), often a handle to a running job.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApexRunner, CrashingRunner, DataflowRunner, DirectRunner, FlinkRunner, GearpumpRunner, SparkRunner, SparkRunnerDebugger, TestApexRunner, TestDataflowRunner, TestFlinkRunner, TestGearpumpRunner, TestSparkRunner

    public abstract class PipelineRunner<ResultT extends PipelineResult>
extends java.lang.Object
    A PipelineRunner runs a Pipeline.

      Overloaded PTransform runner that runs with the default app PipelineOptions.

      Creates a Pipeline out of a single PTransform step, and executes it.
